title: Anthropic's latest AI tool was seen by the legal software industry as a 'shot across the bow.' Here's what it means.
full_text:
Anthropic's latest AI tool was seen by the legal software industry as a 'shot across the bow.' Here's what it means.. A new plugin from the AI startup has sent legal tech into a spin, sparking debate across the industry.. Anthropic CEO Dario AmodeiMichael M. Santiago/Getty Images
  • Anthropic is taking a bite out of the legal software market with a new AI tool.
  • That sent legal software stocks tumbling. T… [+4918 chars]
